subject: Productivity
title: Universal Basic Income Debates
description: One-minute skill: Universal Basic Income Debates.

hook.text: If robots do most jobs, who gets paid? Universal Basic Income says: everyone, just for existing.

buildup.text: UBI gives every citizen a regular cash payment with no conditions. Finland and Kenya have tested it.

discovery.text: Finland's trial found recipients were happier and healthier. Employment rates didn't drop.

twist.text: Critics say UBI is too expensive and removes the incentive to work. The debate is far from settled.

climax.text: As automation accelerates, UBI moves from fringe idea to serious policy discussion.

punchline.text: If machines do the work, humans need a new deal.

quiz.question: What did Finland's UBI trial find?
options: Recipients were happier and employment rates didn't drop
